name: Port & Company® Core Cotton Ringer Tee
description:
An extra soft classic ringer at a great value.

5.4-ounce, 100% cotton
50/50 cotton/poly (Heathers)
90/10 cotton/poly (Athletic Heather)
Removable tag for comfort and relabeling. This tee combines comfort and style, making it a wardrobe essential. Perfect for casual wear or layering, it's a versatile choice for any occasion. The ringer design adds a touch of vintage flair, while the soft cotton fabric ensures all-day comfort. Whether you're running errands or relaxing at home, this tee is sure to become a favorite.

name: District ® Women’s Perfect Tri ® Rocker Tank
description: Turn up the volume in this tank with its perfect mix of softness and attitude. Crafted from a 4.5-ounce, 50/25/25 poly/combed ring spun cotton/rayon blend (32 singles), this tank offers exceptional comfort and drape. Features include a 2x1 rib knit neck, a tear-away label, and a stylish curved hem. This tank is designed for ultimate comfort and style, whether you're hitting the gym or rocking out at a concert. Its unique blend of materials ensures a soft feel and a flattering fit. The rocker design adds a touch of edginess, while the breathable fabric keeps you cool and comfortable. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own, this tank is a must-have for any fashion-forward woman.

name: District ® Perfect Weight ® Tee
description:
An effortless, perfect tee for everyday wear.

4.3-ounce, 100% combed ring spun cotton, 32 singles
Tear-away label
1x1 rib knit neck
Shoulder to shoulder taping
Side seamed. This tee is a versatile addition to any wardrobe, offering both comfort and style. Its lightweight design makes it ideal for layering or wearing on its own, while the soft cotton fabric ensures all-day comfort. Whether you're dressing it up or down, this tee is sure to become a staple in your closet. The perfect weight fabric drapes beautifully and feels great against your skin. A must-have for any fashion-conscious individual.

name: District® Women’s Perfect Tri® Midi Long Sleeve Tee
description:
The perfect tee crafted from three yarns with a modest crop for an effortlessly cool look.

4.5-ounce, 50/25/25 poly/combed ring spun cotton/rayon, 32 singles
Modest crop
1x1 rib knit neck and cuffs
Drop shoulder
Shoulder to shoulder taping
Raw edge hem
Relaxed fit
Tear-away label. This long sleeve tee offers a modern twist on a classic design, perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Its relaxed fit ensures all-day comfort, while the modest crop adds a touch of style. The perfect tri-blend fabric is soft, comfortable, and drapes beautifully. Whether you're hitting the gym or running errands, this tee is sure to become a favorite. A must-have for any fashion-conscious woman.

name: BELLA+CANVAS® Women’s Jersey Crop Tee
description:
Versatile in the most important ways, this rib tee can stand alone or effortlessly layer. 
5.2-ounce, 50/50 combed ring spun cotton/polyester, 40 singles
2x2 rib knit fabrication
Bound neck
Tear-away label. This crop tee is a stylish and comfortable choice for any occasion. Its ribbed design adds a touch of texture, while its cropped length makes it perfect for pairing with high-waisted bottoms. The soft jersey fabric feels great against your skin, while the bound neck adds a touch of durability. Whether you're hitting the town or relaxing at home, this tee is sure to become a favorite. A must-have for any fashion-forward woman.

name: District® Women’s Perfect Tri® Midi Long Sleeve Hoodie
description:
The perfect hoodie tee crafted from three yarns with a modest crop for an effortlessly cool look.
4.5-ounce, 50/25/25 poly/combed ring spun cotton/rayon, 32 singles
Modest crop
Unlined hood with self-fabric drawcords
1x1 rib knit cuffs
Drop shoulder
Shoulder to shoulder taping
Finished hem with side vents
Relaxed fit
Tear-away label
Due to the nature of cotton/polyester blends in dark and neon colors, special care must be taken throughout the decoration process when heat is applied for curing. Please consult with your decorator or material supplier.

name: Sport-Tek® Tall Long Sleeve PosiCharge® Competitor™ Tee
description:
Lightweight, roomy and highly breathable, these moisture-wicking, value-priced tees feature PosiCharge technology to lock in color and prevent logos from fading.

3.8-ounce, 100% polyester interlock with PosiCharge technology
Removable tag for comfort and relabeling
Set-in sleeves. Designed for athletes and active individuals, this tee offers superior comfort and performance. Its moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and comfortable, while its PosiCharge technology ensures long-lasting color. The tall design provides added coverage, while the lightweight fabric allows for maximum breathability. Whether you're hitting the gym or running a marathon, this tee is sure to keep you cool and comfortable. A must-have for any serious athlete.

description:

5.4-ounce, 100% cotton
50/50 poly/cotton (Dark Heather Grey, Neons)
90/10 cotton/poly (Athletic Heather)
Removable tag for comfort and relabeling. This tank top is a comfortable and affordable choice for everyday wear. Its soft cotton fabric and classic design make it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. The removable tag ensures added comfort, while the variety of colors allows you to express your personal style. Whether you're hitting the beach or lounging at home, this tank top is sure to become a favorite. A must-have for any casual wardrobe.

name: District ® Women’s Perfect Weight ® V-Neck Tee
description: The perfect v-neck tee for a polished look. 4.3-ounce, 100% combed ring spun cotton, 32 singles. Tear-away label. 1x1 rib knit neck. Shoulder to shoulder taping. This v-neck tee is designed to flatter your figure and provide all-day comfort. Its soft fabric and classic design make it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. The tear-away label ensures added comfort, while the shoulder-to-shoulder taping provides added durability. Whether you're dressing it up or down, this tee is sure to become a staple in your closet. A must-have for any fashion-conscious woman.

name: Sport-Tek® Sleeveless PosiCharge® Competitor™ Tee
description:
The same sweat-wicking, breathable Competitor tees with greater freedom of movement. Color-protecting PosiCharge technology offers exceptional bleed resistance.

3.8-ounce, 100% polyester interlock with PosiCharge technology
Removable tag for comfort and relabeling. This sleeveless tee is designed for athletes and active individuals who demand performance and comfort. Its moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and comfortable, while its PosiCharge technology ensures long-lasting color. The sleeveless design allows for maximum freedom of movement, while the breathable fabric keeps you cool and comfortable. Whether you're hitting the gym or competing in a race, this tee is sure to help you perform your best. A must-have for any serious athlete.

name: Gildan® Ultra Cotton® 100% US Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt with Pocket
description:
Experience the perfect blend of comfort and performance with our color-locking tee. This tee not only boasts a soft hand feel but also actively wicks away moisture, keeping you dry and comfortable throughout the day. The allover heather pattern adds a touch of modern style, making it a versatile choice for both casual and active wear.

Crafted from 4.1-ounce, 100% polyester jersey enhanced with PosiCharge technology, this tee is designed to maintain its vibrant color and resist fading, even after numerous washes. The removable tag ensures maximum comfort and allows for easy relabeling, making it ideal for custom branding or team uniforms. The set-in sleeves provide a classic and comfortable fit, allowing for a full range of motion. Whether you're hitting the gym, running errands, or simply relaxing at home, this tee is sure to become a go-to favorite for its exceptional comfort, performance, and style.

name: Sport-Tek® PosiCharge® Tough Mesh Full-Button Jersey
description: Step up to the plate in style and performance with the Sport-Tek® PosiCharge® Tough Mesh Full-Button Jersey. Engineered for athletes and fans alike, this jersey combines breathable mesh fabric with advanced PosiCharge® technology to lock in color and resist fading. The full-button design offers a classic look, while the tough mesh construction ensures durability and ventilation. Whether you're on the field or cheering from the stands, this jersey will keep you cool, comfortable, and looking your best. Its superior quality and timeless design make it an ideal option for teams, clubs, and individuals who demand performance and style.

name: Nike Women's Dri-FIT Players Modern Fit Polo
description:
This polo delivers timeless style and performance with ultra-smooth double pique and Dri-FIT moisture management technology.

6-ounce, 100% polyester Dri-FIT fabric
Tailored for a feminine fit
Streamlined self-fabric collar
Five-button placket
Open hem sleeves
Contrast heat transfer metallic silver Swoosh logo on left sleeve. Ideal for golf, work, or casual outings.

name: Nike Dri-FIT Classic Fit Players Polo with Flat Knit Collar
description:
Engineered for the course and beyond, this performance style has a flat knit collar for a classic look. Unparalleled Dri-FIT moisture management technology delivers optimal breathability.

6-ounce, 100% polyester Dri-FIT fabric
Classic fit is fuller through the chest, arms and waist
Flat knit collar
Three-button placket
Open hem sleeves
Contrast heat transfer Swoosh logo on left sleeve. Perfect for sports or casual business wear.
